name: Bionicles: Legend of Manalaa demo
description:
We love Bionicles. And we loved the old flash games. We want to try to make a simple bionicles game that has the feeling and the look of the old Flash games we used to play.

You can play here a demo of the first level on the browser.

If you are interrested, please support us. We would like to add 2 more levels at least, and keep the bionicles spirit alive in the heart of all fans.
